group2.testapp1

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • group2.testapp1.Device
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThermostatDevice, ToggleDevice

    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    Device is an abstract class that represents one particular model such as a light or thermostat. Each Device has a name, id, and BluetoothSocket.
